doctor_utters: How may I help you today?
Do you have sore throat, runny nose, or nasal congestion?
Do you have shortness of breath?
Do you have a wheezing sound when you breathe?
Have you been exposed to any allergens or irritants in the past few days?
Have you been in contact with people with similar symptoms in the past 2 weeks?
Do you have a history of asthma or other respiratory conditions?
Have you been using your bronchodilator more frequently than usual?
patient_utters: Yes, I have a history of asthma and have used a bronchodilator in the past.
